## üí¨ Click and Crop

üì∏ Opens the quick capture bar. Select the option of capture. In this case the third button.

üî≤ You can even adjust the selection afterward to make it fit perfectly.

‚úÖ It‚Äôs a simple way to focus on what matters, share clear feedback, or highlight important details‚Äîmaking collaboration fast and easy.

‚å®Ô∏è You can also use ALT + C for a quicker way to do it.

<div class="relative box-content w-full max-h-[80vh] aspect-[1.90476] py-10">

    src="https://app.supademo.com/embed/cmj93wgtj0d3mf6zp5xw5tynh?embed_v=2&utm_source=embed"

</div>

### üí° Tips

* Use the shortcut by Pressing ALT + C to quickly start a Click and Drag capture without interrupting your workflow.

* Click and drag to capture only the section you want, keeping your Dot clean and focused.

* After capturing, resize or move the selection to make sure it perfectly fits the area you need.

* Capture only what‚Äôs necessary to make your Dot clear and easy to understand.
